comments.body: there is a space here as well?

Hi @jreback 

Yes, there is supposed to be a space, just like many other places in sas7bdat.py. 

Apparently SAS can both pad with zeros and spaces to the right. (Maybe depending on version or something else).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +438,442 @@                # string
                string_chunk[js, current_row] = np.array(source[start:(
                    start + lngt)]).tostring().rstrip(b"\x00 ")
                js += 1
